root.text: Sudden drooping face, paralysis or speech disorder?

sofort.text:
⚠️ Suspected stroke!
- Perform FAST test (Face, Arms, Speech, Time).
- Call 112 immediately.
- Note the time of symptoms.
- Keep the person calm, no food or drink.

unsicher.text: If in doubt, call 112 and describe the symptoms.

ende.text: No acute stroke suspicion. Keep monitoring.
